dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5843 IH: NFIP Stopgap Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Higgins of Louisiana (for himself and Ms. Letlow) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To temporarily extend the National Flood Insurance Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the NFIP Stopgap Act of 2023.

subsection.text: Section 1309(a) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4016(a)) is amended by striking September 30, 2023 and inserting January 15, 2024.
Section 1319 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4026) is amended by striking September 30, 2023 and inserting January 15, 2024.
If this Act is enacted after September 30, 2023, the amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect as if enacted on September 30, 2023.
